content: YouTrip DBS Live Fresh Card Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 04 Dec 2018Are Kickstarter purchases considered as online spend for DBS Live Fresh Credit Card? Or should I use YouTrip to pay instead?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 07 Dec 2018Yes it does. See: https://www.dbs.com.sg/iwov-resources/media/pdf/cards/dbs-lf-acqui-offer-q4-2018-tnc.pdfit's not in the list of exclusions then it's quite safe. You'll get also 10% cash back.Youtrip only good for travel to pay for items / trips / stuff overseas. 0 comments1
